byline.contributor: Bhadra Sharma reported from Kathmandu, and Nida Najar from New Delhi.
byline.original: By BHADRA SHARMA and NIDA NAJAR

abstract: Reconstruction of houses devastated in 2015 Nepal earthquakes will begin in April, one year after first tremors hit; United Nations Children's Fund estimates that 2.8 million people were affected, and that tens of thousands are living in temporary shelters.
lead_paragraph: The reconstruction of houses destroyed in earthquakes will not begin until April, a year after the first tremors hit, a Nepali official has said.

headline.main: Rebuilding of Nepali Homes Hit by Quakes Is Still Delayed, Official Says
headline.print_headline: Nepal’s Rebuilding to Start a Year After Earthquakes

snippet: The reconstruction of houses destroyed in earthquakes will not begin until April, a year after the first tremors hit, a Nepali official has said.
